description.p: Displays a PDF in the PDFViewer control.
The URL for a PDF to display. The URL can be relative to the application webroot or an absolute URL to a remote location.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.pdfViewerLoad()]* method sets the PDF shown in a [PDFViewer] control. The PDF filename is a URL, either to a remote file or a PDF published to the webroot on the Application Server.
